sql.name: 生成验证码
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_verification_code (id, project_id, code_type, code_value, target_user, valid_time, used, creator, create_date) VALUES (':codeId', ':projectId', ':codeType', ':codeValue', ':targetUser', :validTime, 'N', ':userName', ':createDate')
